sentences:
Sentence 0:
Here, we report an efficient procedure for recombinant production and purification of tachyplesin I (THI) with a final yield of 17 mg/L of the culture medium.

Sentence 1:
With the use of soluble expression followed by immobilized metal-ion affinity chromatography, the recombinant protein cleavage and reversed-phase high-performance liquid chromatography, a yield of THI did not exceed 6.5 mg/L of the culture medium.

Sentence 2:
The formed inclusion bodies were highly enriched with the fusion protein, which allowed us to perform direct chemical cleavage of the inclusion bodies solubilized in 6 M guanidine-HCl with subsequent selective precipitation of proteins with trifluoroacetic acid.
sentence_raw: Here, we report an efficient procedure for recombinant production and purification of tachyplesin I (THI) with a final yield of 17 mg/L of the culture medium.

With the use of soluble expression followed by immobilized metal-ion affinity chromatography, the recombinant protein cleavage and reversed-phase high-performance liquid chromatography, a yield of THI did not exceed 6.5 mg/L of the culture medium.

The formed inclusion bodies were highly enriched with the fusion protein, which allowed us to perform direct chemical cleavage of the inclusion bodies solubilized in 6 M guanidine-HCl with subsequent selective precipitation of proteins with trifluoroacetic acid.
